comments: Beautiful professor she helped me out in Arabic I. Her class was very interesting, I learned so much just by attending her class. I wish I could have taken Arabic II with her. Oh she speaks 4 languages not 5.

Amazing professor, can speak up to 5 not 7 languages. Very helpful. Arabic I was very easy A for me. Because I put in at least 2 hours a day every day. Her test are really easy if you take notes and read the book.

She is an Amazing Professor. She is able to speak 7 different languages fluently. She has an M.D. and on top of that a P.H.D in Arabic. She is very tough when it comes to Homework and Tests. But If you have an interest in learning a new language than take her class.
